paper_abstract: An open problem on pseudo-Archimedean t-norms, recently posed by B. De Baets and R. Mesiar [B. De Baets, R. Mesiar, Triangular norms on product lattices, Fuzzy Sets and Systems 104 (1) (1999) 61-75], is discussed. (C) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solution of an open problem on pseudo-Archimedean t-norms
